item.title: 萨利纳斯的 Total Play 公司提出 8.7 亿美元的债务转换要约
item.description: 墨西哥亿万富翁里卡多-萨利纳斯-普利戈（Ricardo Salinas Pliego）旗下的有线电视和互联网服务提供商 Total Play Telecomunicaciones 已提出将 2028 年到期的 6 亿美元无担保债券换成有担保票据的提议。【原文：Mexican billionaire Ricardo Salinas Pliego’s cable and internet provider Total Play Telecomunicaciones has launched an offer to swap $600 million of unsecured bonds due in 2028 for secured notes.】

item.title: 山姆-奥特曼的妹妹指控 OpenAI 首席执行官性侵她
item.description: 山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）的妹妹在向联邦法院提起的诉讼中指控 OpenAI 首席执行官性虐待她近十年。【原文：The sister of Sam Altman accused the OpenAI chief executive officer of sexually abusing her for almost a decade, in a lawsuit filed in federal court.】

item.title: 被列入美国黑名单后，腾讯进行 2006 年以来最大规模回购
item.description: 腾讯控股有限公司（Tencent Holdings Ltd.）因涉嫌与中国军方有关联而被列入美国黑名单，引发大跌，此后该公司回购了近二十年来最多的股票。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. repurchased the most shares in nearly two decades after a selloff sparked by the tech firm’s addition to a US blacklist for alleged links to the Chinese military.】

item.title: 英伟达称三星在人工智能内存芯片设计方面面临挑战
item.description: 英伟达公司负责人黄仁勋表示，三星电子公司在生产用于人工智能系统的新型存储芯片时遇到了困难，但他表示相信合作公司会克服困难。【原文：Nvidia Corp. head Jensen Huang said that Samsung Electronics Co. has faced difficulties producing a new type of memory chip for AI systems, but he expressed confidence that the partner company would overcome the challenges.】

item.title: 拜登将推动地热能源促进人工智能发展
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，乔-拜登总统的政府计划简化地热能源开发的许可程序，以此作为一项更广泛的行政命令的一部分，以促进人工智能数据中心的基础设施建设。【原文：President Joe Biden’s administration plans to streamline permitting for geothermal energy development as part of a broader executive order to boost infrastructure for AI data centers, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美元走强令亚洲承压，中国提升人民币支持率
item.description: 由于隔夜美元反弹有可能破坏市场对管理货币及其亚洲同业的情绪，中国继续严格控制人民币的每日参考汇率。【原文：China maintained its tight grip on the yuan with its daily reference rate, as an overnight rally in the dollar threatened to derail sentiment toward the managed currency and its Asian peers.】

item.title: 螺旋公司 27 亿美元的再融资拉开了 2025 年 CMBS 市场的序幕
item.description: Tishman Speyer 和 Henry Crown 在商业抵押贷款支持证券市场上为纽约螺旋办公楼筹集了 26.5 亿美元，为分析师预计今年将取得辉煌业绩的单一资产、单一借款人领域拉开了序幕。【原文：Tishman Speyer and Henry Crown have raised $2.65 billion in the commercial mortgage-backed securities market for The Spiral office tower in New York, kicking off the single asset, single borrower sector that analysts expect to post a banner year.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官认为量子计算的应用尚需时日，量子计算股票下跌
item.description: 周二，在英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）表示，"非常有用的 "量子计算机可能还需要几十年的时间。【原文：The shares of IonQ Inc. and other companies linked to quantum computing tumbled in extended trading on Tuesday after Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang said “very useful” quantum computers are likely decades away.】

item.title: 澳大利亚关键通胀指标降温，降息成为可能
item.description: 衡量澳大利亚通胀的一项重要指标在 11 月份出现下滑，更加接近央行的目标区间，这表明政策制定者可能有余地考虑尽早放松政策。货币下跌。【原文：An important measure of Australian inflation slipped in November to edge closer to the central bank’s target band, suggesting that policymakers may have room to consider easing sooner than later. The currency fell.】

item.title: 新任印度央行行长在美元飙升之际面临解除卢比束缚的呼声
item.description: 印度新任央行行长面临着管理卢比汇率的艰难抉择：是像其前任那样集中精力抑制汇率波动，还是在美元持续飙升的情况下响应提高灵活性的呼声。【原文：India’s new central bank head faces a tough decision on managing the rupee’s exchange rate — focus on squeezing volatility like his predecessor did, or respond to calls for more flexibility as the dollar continues to surge.】

item.title: 韩国对美国债券收益率跌至纪录低点，韩元遭受重创
item.description: 与美国国债收益率相比，韩国国债收益率连续创下历史新低，这给本已受政治危机打击的韩元带来了更大压力。【原文：South Korea’s bond yields have been sinking to a succession of record lows versus those on US Treasuries, piling further pressure on the won already battered by a political crisis.】

item.title: 顽强的锂供应仍是复苏的障碍
item.description: 锂供应持续过剩，而且如果价格上涨，一些矿山可能会重启，这意味着这种电池金属今年不太可能大幅回升。【原文：A persistent lithium glut and the prospect that some mines could be restarted if prices rise means the battery metal is unlikely to mount a significant recovery this year.】

item.title: 中国最富裕地区降低电价以保护工业
item.description: 中国越来越多的地区正在下调电价，以帮助其陷入困境的工业，这可能会加剧对电力供应商利润的挤压。【原文：More Chinese regions are cutting electricity prices to help out their embattled industries, which is likely to worsen the squeeze on profits at power suppliers.】

item.title: 三星因人工智能芯片失误影响业务，利润令人失望
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.）的季度利润不及预期，反映出该公司为夺回在关键的人工智能芯片和智能手机领域的市场份额而付出了高昂的代价。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co.’s quarterly profit missed estimates, reflecting a costly effort to claw back market share in the pivotal AI chip and smartphone arenas.】

item.title: 报告显示美国石油库存减少，石油连续第二天上涨
item.description: 在一份行业报告指出美国库存再次下降后，石油连续第二天上涨。【原文：Oil rose for a second day after an industry report pointed to another drop in US inventories.】

item.title: 北卡罗来纳州的亚马逊工人将于二月投票成立工会
item.description: 亚马逊公司在北卡罗来纳州一家仓库的工人将于二月份投票决定他们是否希望由新成立的 "卡罗莱纳亚马逊人团结与赋权联合会"（Carolina Amazonians United for Solidarity and Empowerment）代表他们。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. workers at a North Carolina warehouse will vote in February to determine if they want to be represented by the upstart Carolina Amazonians United for Solidarity and Empowerment.】

item.title: 通胀风险令亚洲股市追随美国股市走势：市场综述
item.description: 美联储因通胀风险而不会在7月前再次降息的押注导致国债抛售加剧，亚洲股市将跟随美国股市走低。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set to follow US peers lower after a selloff in Treasuries deepened on bets the Federal Reserve won’t cut interest rates again before July because of inflation risks.】

item.title: 埃克森预计油价下跌将带来 7 亿美元利润损失
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. said earnings took a hit from lower crude prices and narrowing refining margins during the final three months of 2024.】

item.title: 市场对中国通缩螺旋发出警报
item.description:
投资者越来越担心，中国有可能陷入可能持续数十年的经济低迷。【原文：

Investors are increasingly concerned that China risks sliding into an economic malaise that could last decades.

】

item.title: 特朗普宣誓就职在即，债券市场瞄准 5%的美国 10 年期收益率
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）就职典礼的临近，深陷国债市场低迷的债券交易员们正准备迎接更多同样的情况，期权显示美国10年期国债收益率有可能飙升至5%；这是2023年10月以来从未见过的水平。【原文：Bond traders who have been mired in a Treasury market slump are bracing for more of the same as Donald Trump’s inauguration approaches, with options indicating the potential for a spike in US 10-year yields to 5% — a level not seen October 2023.】

item.title: 科技股飙升，"小虎队 "连续第二年获利
item.description: 已故朱利安-罗伯逊（Julian Robertson）的弟子们经营的对冲基金连续第二年实现两位数收益，继续从 2022 年的糟糕业绩中反弹。【原文：Hedge funds run by proteges of the late Julian Robertson reported a second consecutive year of double-digit gains as they continue to bounce back from a terrible 2022.】

item.title: 巴西酝酿新一轮开支削减以平息投资者担忧
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）承诺履行财政责任，但备受期待的一揽子削减计划未能缓解投资者的担忧，巴西政府正在权衡进一步削减开支的方案。【原文：Brazil’s government is weighing additional spending cuts after a much-anticipated package of reductions failed to soothe investor worries about President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s commitment to fiscal responsibility.】

item.title: 预计 2025 年新西兰房价将小幅上涨
item.description: 据新西兰核心逻辑公司（CoreLogic New Zealand）称，新西兰房价在2024年最后几个月未能对利率下降做出反应后，今年可能会出现小幅回升。【原文：New Zealand house prices may show a modest recovery this year after failing to respond to falling interest rates in the final months of 2024, according to CoreLogic New Zealand.】

item.title: 澳大利亚房价下跌幅度不大
item.description: 早上好，我是悉尼的乔吉。以下是您今天需要了解的内容。今日必读：- 澳大利亚房地产低迷可能只是昙花一现- 收购公司瞄准澳大利亚养老金体系- 对冲基金加码澳元空头押注。【原文：Good morning, it's Georgie here in Sydney. Here’s what you need to know today.Today’s must-reads:• Australia housing downturn could be short lived• Buyout firms target slice of Australia’s pensions system• Hedge funds load up on Aussie dollar short bets】

item.title: Bonaccord Capital 为最新 GP 基金募集 16 亿美元资金
item.description: 另类资产管理公司 P10 Inc. 旗下的 Bonaccord Capital Partners 为其最新基金募集了 16 亿美元，专门用于支持私募市场公司。【原文：Bonaccord Capital Partners, an arm of alternative asset manager P10 Inc., has raised $1.6 billion for its latest fund dedicated to backing private markets firms.】

item.title: Galp 首席执行官 Filipe Silva 因家庭原因辞职
item.description: Galp Energia SGPS SA 表示，Filipe Silva 因家庭原因辞去葡萄牙石油公司首席执行官一职。【原文：Galp Energia SGPS SA said Filipe Silva resigned as chief executive officer of the Portuguese oil company for family reasons.】

item.title: 英国警告深冻天气将导致电力市场紧张
item.description: 英国电网运营商发布电力市场警告称，由于风力输出下降，同时气温骤降，周三的预测供需之间没有足够的缓冲。【原文：The UK’s grid operator issued a power-market warning saying there is an insufficient buffer between predicted supply and demand on Wednesday as wind output falls at the same time as temperatures plunge.】

item.title: 比特币投资者被勒令披露 1.24 亿美元的访问密码
item.description: 上个月，一名早期比特币投资者因与加密货币销售有关的税务欺诈而被判处两年监禁，他已被勒令公开其密码，以便美国官员能够解锁目前价值约 1.24 亿美元的数字资产。【原文：An early Bitcoin investor sentenced last month to two years in prison for tax fraud related to cryptocurrency sales has been ordered to disclose his secret pass codes so US officials can unlock digital assets now valued at about $124 million.】

item.title: 经济数据推高利率，比特币跌破 10 万美元
item.description: 比特币重返 100,000 美元上方的步伐并没有持续太久。周二，由于新的经济数据导致国债收益率飙升，比特币创下两周多来的最大跌幅，与美国股市一起回落。【原文：Bitcoin’s march back above $100,000 didn’t last long. The token slid the most in more than two weeks on Tuesday, joining a retreat in US stocks, as fresh economic data sent Treasury yields soaring.】

item.title: 旧金山机场将出售 10 亿美元债券用于扩建
item.description: 旧金山国际机场正计划通过一项 10 亿美元的交易利用市政债券市场，成为其同行中最新一家寻求新资本的公司。【原文：The San Francisco International Airport is planning to tap the muni bond market with a $1 billion deal, becoming the latest among its peers to seek new capital.】
